villans.name: Tiny Dancer
villans.knownfor: Being a sweet little ballerina, but watch out because she will dance odd into the world.
villans.lastseen: Toe stepping in Case File “Jinx”

villans.name: Jellybean Joe
villans.knownfor: Keeping jellybean and estimation secrets.
villans.lastseen: With giant jellybean jars in Case File “What Ever Happened to Agent Oz”

villans.name: Even Steven
villans.knownfor: An attraction to even numbers like 2, 4, 6, and so on. Unfortunately, he has also been known to steal them!
villans.lastseen: In early Case File “Training Day”

villans.name: The Puppet Master
villans.knownfor: Turning agents into PUPPETS. ‘Nuff said.
villans.lastseen: Turning agents into puppets in Case File “Puppet Show”

villans.name: Symmetric-Al
villans.knownfor: Being perfectly symmetrical. Oh, and also wanting to be the last symmetrical thing in the world!
villans.lastseen: In Case File “My Better Half”

villans.name: Shapeshifter
villans.knownfor: Being able to turn into anything in a FLASH! A chair, a wall, you name it!
villans.lastseen: Hard to tell because she shape shifted into so many things but she was caught in the act last in Case File “The Briefcase”

villans.name: Flatam
villans.knownfor: Making everything flat.
villans.lastseen: Making a mess at Polly Graph’s lemonade stand when he made her ice cubes flat in Case File “Flatastrophe”

villans.name: Circle Sue
villans.knownfor: Being really into circles.
villans.lastseen: Changing her mind on circles in Case File “Soundcheck”. She now really likes triangles but kept her name. Circle Sue just sounds better than Triangle Sue.

villans.name: Noisemaker
villans.knownfor: Replacing people’s voices with sounds. Not just any sounds, but super annoying ones like whale noises.
villans.lastseen: Causing noise mayhem in Case File “Odd Outbreak”

villans.name: Equal Evan
villans.knownfor: Wanting everything to be equal, so if there is one juice box on one side, he wants another juice box on the other side.
villans.lastseen: Marking-up the town in Case File “The One That Got Away”

villans.name: Halvsie Harriet
villans.knownfor: Liking only half of everything. She lives her life like that too – she has half a door to her apartment and knit a half sweater - it can’t be very warm.
villans.lastseen: Serving half tea in Case File “The Great Grinaldi”

villans.name: Jimmy Jinx
villans.knownfor: Creating massive spells of the jinx, where everyone can’t stop saying the same thing. How annoying!
villans.lastseen: Causing noise mayhem in Case File “Jinx”

villans.name: Evil Queen
villans.knownfor: Using her scepter wand to send people to other kingdoms forever.
villans.lastseen: Looking fancy in Case File “Undercover Olive”

villans.name: Evil Teddy
villans.knownfor: Turning perfectly nice teddy bears into evil robots.
villans.lastseen: Causing teddy mayhem in Case File 'Assistants Creed'.

villans.name: Underwater Ulanda
villans.knownfor: Taking things and bringing them to the bottom of the ocean.
villans.lastseen: Looking water-ready in Case File “Undercover Olive”

villans.name: Archer Achilles
villans.knownfor: Being a pro with the bow and arrow. Oh, and she can shoot lasers from her bow!
villans.lastseen: Looking suspicious in Case File “Undercover Olive”

villans.name: Leprechaun Lenny
villans.knownfor: Making gorgeous shoes but also turning things into gold, which sounds good, but having gold for feet makes it really hard to walk.
villans.lastseen: Looking green in “Undercover Olive”

villans.name: Odd Todd
villans.knownfor: Getting kicked off Odd Squad
villans.lastseen: Releasing a Pienado

villans.name: Tommy Two-Sie
villans.knownfor: Being attracted to the number 2. He wears 2 hats, 2 shirts, and 2 fanny packs. Silly!
villans.lastseen: Being two-rific in Case File “Mystic Egg Pizza”

villans.name: Quarter Quinn
villans.knownfor: Being attracted to quarters of everything. She likes them so much that she steals them!
villans.lastseen: Being suspicious, packing up her mini-van in Case File “Mystic Egg Pizza”

villans.name: Glenn
villans.knownfor: Making delicious but very odd drinks. Each flavor of his Glenn Gusher drinks makes you turn into a pattern.
villans.lastseen: Turning Otto into polka dots in Case File “Picture Day”!
